# The `PMTopLevelManager` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pmtoplevelmanager">PMTopLevelManager</a> manages LastUser info and collects common APIs used by top level pass managers. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::PMTopLevelManager</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pmtoplevelmanager">PMTopLevelManager</a> manages LastUser info and collects common APIs used by top level pass managers.

### schedulePass() {#a5fb719fc8062d116b93091d9c9addd43}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void PMTopLevelManager::schedulePass (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> &#42; P)</>}>
Schedule pass P for execution.

Make sure that passes required by P are run before P is run. Update analysis info maintained by the manager. Remove dead passes. This is a recursive function.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/legacypassmanagers-h/#l00176">176</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/legacypassmanagers-h">LegacyPassManagers.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/legacypassmanager-cpp/#l00661">661</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/legacypassmanager-cpp">LegacyPassManager.cpp</a>.
